content.html: A coworker has flagged this by me a few months back, implying “archived is bad” but I tried to tell them, there’s inherently nothing bad about using a library like gorilla/mux as long as you don’t find any bugs with it. The negative connotation of “archived” is unfortunate.
content.value:
A coworker has flagged this by me a few months back, implying “archived is bad” but I tried to tell them, there’s inherently nothing bad about using a library like gorilla/mux as long as you don’t find any bugs with it.

The negative connotation of “archived” is unfortunate.
